body_html:
Is there any way of integrating the Eigen fix into the r1.10 tensorflow build using Bazel? This is currently breaking my Windows build, and I'm not sure how to slipstream the Eigen patch file into the Bazel build.

Is there any way to have r1.10 download a different version of Eigen during the build process?
body_text:
Is there any way of integrating the Eigen fix into the r1.10 tensorflow build using Bazel? This is currently breaking my Windows build, and I'm not sure how to slipstream the Eigen patch file into the Bazel build.
Is there any way to have r1.10 download a different version of Eigen during the build process?
body:
Is there any way of integrating the Eigen fix into the r1.10 tensorflow build using Bazel? This is currently breaking my Windows build, and I'm not sure how to slipstream the Eigen patch file into the Bazel build.

Is there any way to have r1.10 download a different version of Eigen during the build process?
